events.event-delete-confirmation: Ali ste prepričani, da želite izbrisati ta dogodek?
events.new-notification-form-description: Mealie uporablja Apprise knjižnico za kreiranje obvestil. Omogoča več različnih servisov za uporabo obvestil. Preglejte njihovo wiki stran, za bolj natančen vodič, kako izdelati URL za vaš servis. Če je na voljo, so za vaš izbran servis obvestil, na voljo tudi dodane možnosti.
events.what-events: Katere dogodke naj spremlja obveščevalni sistem?
events.when-a-user-in-your-group-creates-a-new-: Ko uporabnik v tvoji skupini ustvari nov jedilnik
events.when-a-new-user-joins-your-group: Ko se novi uporabnik pridruži tvoji skupini

general.confirm-delete-generic: Ali ste prepričani, da želite to izbrisati?
general.name: Ime
general.subject: Zadeva
general.confirm-delete-generic-with-name: Ali ste prepričani, da želite izbrisati to {name}?
general.confirm-delete-own-admin-account: Pozor, brišete svoj admin račun! To opravilo se ne da povrnit in vaš račun bo za vedno izbrisan?
general.copied-items-to-clipboard: Nič ni kopirano na odložišče|Ena postavka kopirana na odložišče|{count} postavk kopiranih na odložišče
general.unsaved-changes: Imate neohranjene spremembe. Ali želite shraniti pred odhodom? V redu, če želite shraniti, Prekliči, če želite zavreči spremembe.
general.clipboard-copy-failure: Kopiranje na odložišče ni bilo uspešno.
general.confirm-delete-generic-items: Ali ste prepričani, da želite izbrisati izbrane elemente?

group.cannot-delete-group-with-users: Ne morem izbrisati skupine z uporabniki

settings.keep-my-recipes-private-description: Nastavi vaše skupine in vse recepte privzeto kot privatni. Kasneje lahko to vedno spremenite.

group.manage-members-description: Urejaj dovoljenja članov v tvojih skupinah. {manage} uporabniku dovoli dostop do strani z upravljanjem podatkov. {invite} uporabniku dovoli generiranje vabil za druge uporabnike. Lastniki skupin ne morejo spreminjati svojih dovoljenj.
group.default-recipe-preferences-description: To so privzete nastavitve za nove recepte ustvarjene v tvoji skupini. Nastavitve lahko spreminjaš za posamezne recepte v nastavitvah recepta.
group.private-group-description: Če svojo skupino nastaviš na zasebno, bodo vse možnosti za javni prikaz nastavljene na privzeto vrednost. To razveljavi nastavitve javnega prikaza posameznih receptov.
group.enable-public-access-description: Skupinski recepti naj bodo privzeto javni, obiskovalcem omogoči ogled receptov brez prijave
group.allow-users-outside-of-your-group-to-see: Dovoli uporabnikom zunaj tvoje skupine, da vidijo tvoje recepte

Ko je omogočeno, lahko uporabiš javno povezavo za delitev določenih receptov brez prijave uporabnika. Ko je onemogočeno, lahko deliš recepte le z uporabniki, ki so v tvoji skupini ali z vnaprej ustvarjeno zasebno povezavo
group.show-nutrition-information-description: Ko je vključeno bodo hranilni vrednosti prikazane na receptu, če so na voljo. Če informacije o hranilni vrednosti niso na voljo, ne bodo prikazane
group.show-recipe-assets-description: Ko je vključeno, bodo viri za recept prikazani v kolikor so na voljo
group.default-to-landscape-view-description: Ko je vključeno, bo glava recepta prikazana ležeče
group.disable-users-from-commenting-on-recipes: Skrij sekcijo s komentarji na strani z recepti in onemogoči komentiranje
group.disable-organizing-recipe-ingredients-by: Izključi organizacijo recepta po enotah in živilih
Skrij živila, enote in količino za sestavine v receptu in jih obravnavaj kot navadna tekstovna okna.
group.admin-group-management-text: Spremembe v tej skupini se poznajo takoj.

meal-plan.no-meal-plan-defined-yet: Za danes ni definiranjega načrta obroka
meal-plan.no-meal-planned-for-today: Za danes ni planiranega načrta obroka
meal-plan.only-recipes-with-these-categories-will-: Samo recepti v teh kategorija bodo uporabljeni v načrtu obroka
meal-plan.meal-plan-rules-description: You can create rules for auto selecting recipes for your meal plans. These rules are used by the server to determine the random pool of recipes to select from when creating meal plans. Note that if rules have the same day/type constraints then the categories of the rules will be merged. In practice, it's unnecessary to create duplicate rules, but it's possible to do so.
meal-plan.new-rule-description: When creating a new rule for a meal plan you can restrict the rule to be applicable for a specific day of the week and/or a specific type of meal. To apply a rule to all days or all meal types you can set the rule to "Any" which will apply it to all the possible values for the day and/or meal type.

chowdown.description-long: Mealie natively supports the chowdown repository format. Download the code repository as a .zip file and upload it below.
chowdown.title: Chowdown

nextcloud.description-long: Nextcloud recipes can be imported from a zip file that contains the data stored in Nextcloud. See the example folder structure below to ensure your recipes are able to be imported.
nextcloud.title: Nextcloud Cookbook

copymethat.description-long: Mealie can import recipes from Copy Me That. Export your recipes in HTML format, then upload the .zip below.
copymethat.title: Copy Me That Recipe Manager

paprika.description-long: Mealie can import recipes from the Paprika application. Export your recipes from paprika, rename the export extension to .zip and upload it below.
paprika.title: Paprika Recipe Manager

mealie-pre-v1.description-long: Mealie can import recipes from the Mealie application from a pre v1.0 release. Export your recipes from your old instance, and upload the zip file below. Note that only recipes can be imported from the export.
mealie-pre-v1.title: Mealie Pre v1.0

tandoor.description-long: Mealie can import recipes from Tandoor. Export your data in the "Default" format, then upload the .zip below.
tandoor.title: Tandoor recepti

migration.recipe-data-migrations-explanation: Recipes can be migrated from another supported application to Mealie. This is a great way to get started with Mealie.
migration.coming-from-another-application-or-an-ev: Coming from another application or an even older version of Mealie? Check out migrations and see if your data can be imported.
migration.nextcloud-text: Nextcloud recipes can be imported from a zip file that contains the data stored in Nextcloud. See the example folder structure below to ensure your recipes are able to be imported.
migration.chowdown-text: Mealie natively supports the chowdown repository format. Download the code repository as a .zip file and upload it below.
migration.paprika-text: Mealie can import recipes from the Paprika application. Export your recipes from paprika, rename the export extension to .zip and upload it below.
migration.mealie-text: Mealie can import recipes from the Mealie application from a pre v1.0 release. Export your recipes from your old instance, and upload the zip file below. Note that only recipes can be imported from the export.

plantoeat.title: Plan to Eat
plantoeat.description-long: Mealie can import recipies from Plan to Eat.

myrecipebox.title: My Recipe Box
myrecipebox.description-long: Mealie can import recipes from My Recipe Box. Export your recipes in CSV format, then upload the .csv file below.

new-recipe.error-details: Samo spletne strani, ki vsebujejo Id+json ali mikro podatke, se lahko uvozijo v Mealie. Večina večjih spletnih strani z recepti že podpirajo to podatkovno strukturo. Če se vaša stran ne uvozi, v log datoteki pa so json podatki, prosim odprite težavo na github-u z URL naslovom in podatki.
new-recipe.paste-in-your-recipe-data-each-line-will: Prilepi podatke recepta. Vsaka vrsta bo obravnavana kot element v seznamu
new-recipe.upload-individual-zip-file: Naloži posamezno .zip datoteko, izvoženo iz druge Mealie namestitve.
new-recipe.url-form-hint: Kopiraj in prilepi povezavo iz vaše priljubljene strani z recepti
new-recipe.trim-whitespace-description: Poreži začetne in končne presledke, kot tudi prazne vrstice
new-recipe.trim-prefix-description: Poreži prvi znak v vsaki vrstici
new-recipe.split-by-numbered-line-description: Poskušaj razdeliti odstavek z ujemanjem '1)' ali '1.' vzorcev
new-recipe.make-recipe-image: To sliko izberi kot sliko recepta

recipe.share-recipe-message: Rad bi delil moj {0} recept z vami.
recipe.title: Naslov
recipe.failed-to-add-recipes-to-list: Dodajanje recepta na seznam ni uspelo
recipe.failed-to-add-recipe-to-mealplan: Napaka pri dodajanji recepta v jedilnik
recipe.timeline-is-empty: Nothing on the timeline yet. Try making this recipe!
recipe.timeline-no-events-found-try-adjusting-f: No events found. Try adjusting your search filters.
recipe.api-extras-description: Recipes extras are a key feature of the Mealie API. They allow you to create custom JSON key/value pairs within a recipe, to reference from 3rd party applications. You can use these keys to provide information, for example to trigger automations or custom messages to relay to your desired device.
recipe.attach-images-hint: Attach images by dragging & dropping them into the editor
recipe.enable-ingredient-amounts-to-use-this-fe: Enable ingredient amounts to use this feature
recipe.recipes-with-units-or-foods-defined-cann: Recipes with units or foods defined cannot be parsed.
recipe.select-one-of-the-various-ways-to-create: Select one of the various ways to create a recipe
recipe.create-recipe-description: Create a new recipe from scratch.
recipe.create-a-recipe-by-providing-the-name-al: Create a recipe by providing the name. All recipes must have unique names.
recipe.new-recipe-names-must-be-unique: New recipe names must be unique
recipe.scrape-recipe-description: Scrape a recipe by url. Provide the url for the site you want to scrape, and Mealie will attempt to scrape the recipe from that site and add it to your collection.
recipe.scrape-recipe-have-a-lot-of-recipes: Have a lot of recipes you want to scrape at once?
recipe.import-from-zip-description: Import a single recipe that was exported from another Mealie instance.
recipe.zip-files-must-have-been-exported-from-m: .zip files must have been exported from Mealie
recipe.create-a-recipe-by-uploading-a-scan: Create a recipe by uploading a scan.
recipe.upload-a-png-image-from-a-recipe-book: Upload a png image from a recipe book
recipe.recipe-bulk-importer-description: The Bulk recipe importer allows you to import multiple recipes at once by queueing the sites on the backend and running the task in the background. This can be useful when initially migrating to Mealie, or when you want to import a large number of recipes.
recipe.recipe-debugger-description: Grab the URL of the recipe you want to debug and paste it here. The URL will be scraped by the recipe scraper and the results will be displayed. If you don't see any data returned, the site you are trying to scrape is not supported by Mealie or its scraper library.

backup.error-creating-backup-see-log-file: Napaka pri izdelovanju varnostni kopije. Preveri strežniške datoteke
backup.experimental-description: Backups are total snapshots of the database and data directory of the site. This includes all data and cannot be set to exclude subsets of data. You can think of this as a snapshot of Mealie at a specific time. These serve as a database agnostic way to export and import data, or back up the site to an external location.
backup.back-restore-description: Restoring this backup will overwrite all the current data in your database and in the data directory and replace them with the contents of this backup. {cannot-be-undone} If the restoration is successful, you will be logged out.
backup.cannot-be-undone: This action cannot be undone - use with caution.
backup.postgresql-note: If you are using PostGreSQL, please review the {backup-restore-process} prior to restoring.
backup.irreversible-acknowledgment: I understand that this action is irreversible, destructive and may cause data loss

settings.remove-existing-entries-matching-importe: Odstrani vrednosti, ki se ujemajo z vnesenimi vrednostmi

theme.error-creating-theme-see-log-file: Napaka pri izdelavi teme. Preveri dnevniško datoteko.

token.copy-this-token-for-use-with-an-external: Kopiraj žeton za uporabo v zunanji aplikaciji. Ta žeton kasneje ne bo več viden.
token.you-have-token-count: You have no active tokens.|You have one active token.|You have {count} active tokens.

toolbox.recipes-affected: Ne vpliva na recepte|Vpliva na en recept|Vpliva na {count} recepte

webhooks.the-urls-listed-below-will-recieve-webho: Spodnji URL naslovi bodo prejeli webhook-e s podatki receptov za načrt obrokov na načrtovani dan. Trenutno se bodo webhooki-i izvedli ob
webhooks.description: The webhooks defined below will be executed when a meal is defined for the day. At the scheduled time the webhooks will be sent with the data from the recipe that is scheduled for the day. Note that webhook execution is not exact. The webhooks are executed on a 5 minutes interval so the webhooks will be executed within 5 +/- minutes of the scheduled.

settings.bug-report-information: Use this information to report a bug. Providing details of your instance to developers is the best way to get your issues resolved quickly.
settings.docker-volume-help: Mealie requires that the frontend container and the backend share the same docker volume or storage. This ensures that the frontend container can properly access the images and assets stored on disk.
settings.status-unknown-try-running-a-validation: Status Unknown. Try running a validation.
settings.application-version-error-text: Your current version ({0}) does not match the latest release. Considering updating to the latest version ({1}).
settings.secure-site-error-text: Serve via localhost or secure with https. Clipboard and additional browser APIs may not work.
settings.secure-site-success-text: Site is accessed by localhost or https
settings.server-side-base-url-error-text: `BASE_URL` is still the default value on API Server. This will cause issues with notifications links generated on the server for emails, etc.
settings.server-side-base-url-success-text: Server Side URL does not match the default
settings.ldap-ready-error-text: Not all LDAP Values are configured. This can be ignored if you are not using LDAP Authentication.
settings.ldap-ready-success-text: Required LDAP variables are all set.
settings.oidc-ready-error-text: Not all OIDC Values are configured. This can be ignored if you are not using OIDC Authentication.
settings.oidc-ready-success-text: Required OIDC variables are all set.

shopping-list.label: Oznaka
shopping-list.linked-item-warning: Ta sestavina je povezana na en ali več receptov. Če spremenite enote količin, se lahko kaj podre, ko dodajate ali odstranjujete iz seznama.
shopping-list.are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete-this-ite: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
shopping-list.linked-recipes-count: No Linked Recipes|One Linked Recipe|{count} Linked Recipes
shopping-list.items-checked-count: No items checked|One item checked|{count} items checked

signup.welcome-to-mealie: Dobrodobšli v Meali! Če želite postati uporabnik te namestitve, potrebujete imeti veljavno povezavo povabila. Če še niste prejeli povabila se ne boste mogli vpisati. Če želite prejeti povabilo, kontaktiraje administratorja strani.

user.are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete-the-link: Ste prepričani, da želite izbrisati povezavo <b>{link}<b/>?
user.are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete-the-user: Ste prepričani, da želite izbrisati uporabnika <b>{activeName}<b/> ID: {activeId}<b/>?
user.error-cannot-delete-super-user: Napaka! Ne morem izbrisati super uporabnika
user.password-has-been-reset-to-the-default-p: Geslo je bila nastavljeno na privzeto geslo
user.use-8-characters-or-more-for-your-passwo: Uporabi vsaj 8 znakov ali več za vaše geslo
user.you-are-not-allowed-to-delete-this-user: Nimate pravic za izbris tega uporabnika
user.enable-advanced-content-description: Omogoči napredne nastavitve kot so spreminjanje merila receptov, API ključi, Webhook in upravljanje s podatki. Ne skrbite, vse to lahko spremenite kasneje
user.please-enter-your-email-and-password: Please enter your email and password
user.account-locked-please-try-again-later: Account Locked. Please try again later
user.authentication-method-hint: This specifies how a user will authenticate with Mealie. If you're not sure, choose 'Mealie
user.user-can-invite-other-to-group: User can invite other to group
user.it-looks-like-this-is-your-first-time-lo: It looks like this is your first time logging in.
user.dont-want-to-see-this-anymore-be-sure-to: Don't want to see this anymore? Be sure to change your email in your user settings!
user.forgot-password-text: Please enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
user.changes-reflected-immediately: Changes to this user will be reflected immediately.

language-dialog.select-description: Izberite jezik Meali uporabniškega vmesnika. Nastavitve so v uporabi samo za vas in ne za ostale uporabnike.
language-dialog.how-to-contribute-description: Če kaj ni prevedeno, napačno prevedeno ali vaš jezik v celoti manjka iz seznama? Poglejte si {read-the-docs-link} kako lahko pomagate!

foods.merge-dialog-text: Združitev izbranih jedi bo združila izvorno jed in ciljno jed v eno samo jed. Izvorna jed bo izbrisana in vse povezave na izvorno jed, bodo po novem kazale na ciljno jed.
foods.seed-dialog-text: Napolni podatkovno bazo s jedmi, ki izvirajo iz vašega lokalnega jezika. To bo kreiralo 200+ običajnih jedi, ki se lahko uporabijo za organizacijo vaše podatkovne baze. Jedi so prevedene s pomočjo skupnosti.
foods.seed-dialog-warning: Nekatere elemente že imate v podatkovni bazi. To opravilo ne bo upoštevalo dvojnikov in jih boste morali sami ročno upravljati.

units.seed-dialog-text: Napolni podatkovno bazo z običajnimi enotami, glede na vaš lokalni jezik.
units.combine-unit-description: Combining the selected units will merge the Source Unit and Target Unit into a single unit. The {source-unit-will-be-deleted} and all of the references to the Source Unit will be updated to point to the Target Unit.

labels.seed-dialog-text: Napolni podatkovno bazi s običajnimi oznakami, glede na vaš lokalni jezik.

recipes.are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete-all-expo: Are you sure you want to delete all export data?
recipes.confirm-delete-recipes: Are you sure you want to delete the following recipes? This action cannot be undone.
recipes.the-following-recipes-selected-length-wi: The following recipes ({0}) will be exported.
recipes.settings-chosen-explanation: Settings chosen here, excluding the locked option, will be applied to all selected recipes.
recipes.recipe-data-description: Use this section to manage the data associated with your recipes. You can perform several bulk actions on your recipes including exporting, deleting, tagging, and assigning categories.
recipes.data-exports-description: This section provides links to available exports that are ready to download. These exports do expire, so be sure to grab them while they're still available.

data-pages.data-management-description: Select which data set you want to make changes to.

user-registration.provide-registration-token-description: Prosim pridobite registracijski žeton povezan s skupino, ki se ji želite pridružiti. Pridobiti ga boste morali od obstoječega člana skupine.
user-registration.group-details-description: Preden kreirate račun, morate kreirati skupino. V skupini boste sprva samo vi, vendar imate možnost povabiti še ostale člane. Člani v vaši skupini lahko delijo načrte obrokov, nakupovalne sezname, recepte in še več!
user-registration.use-seed-data-description: Meali vključuje zbirko jedi, enot in oznak, ki se lahko uporabno uporabijo v vaši skupini za organizacijo receptov.

recipe-share.recipe-link-copied-message: Povezava recepta je kopirana v odložišče

banner-experimental.title: Poskusne lastnosti
banner-experimental.description: Ta stran vsebuje preiskusne ali v delu lastnosti. Se opravičujem za nastalo zmešnjavo.

ocr-editor.flatten: Združi ne glede na prvotno oblikovanje

help.selection-mode-desc: Način izbiranje je glavni način, ki se ga uporablja za vnos podatkov:

selection-mode-steps.draw: Nariši pravokotnik na tekstu, ki ga želiš izbrati.
selection-mode-steps.click: Kliknite kamorkoli na desnem polju in potem kliknite nazaj na pravokotnik nad sliko.
selection-mode-steps.result: Izbrani test bo prikazan znotraj prejšnjega izbranega polja.

help.pan-and-zoom-desc: Izberite premikanje in povečavo s klikanjem na ikono. Ta način omogoča povečanje slike in premikanje naokrog, kar olajša delo z velikimi slikami.

split-modes.line-mode-desc: V vrstičnem načinu bo tekst prilagojen z ohranitvijo prvotnih prelomov vrstic. Ta način je uporaben, ko uporabljaš masovno dodajanje na seznam sestavin, kjer je vsaka sestavina v svoji vrstici.
split-modes.block-mode-desc: V blokovnem načinu bo tekst razdeljen na bloke. Ta način je uporaben ko masovno dodajate navodila, ki so običajno napisana v več paragrafih.
split-modes.flat-mode-desc: V sploščenem načinu, bo tekst dodan na izbrano polje recepta, brez novih vrstic.

maintenance.action-clean-directories-description: Removes all the recipe folders that are not valid UUIDs
maintenance.action-clean-temporary-files-description: Removes all files and folders in the .temp directory
maintenance.action-clean-images-description: Removes all the images that don't end with .webp
maintenance.actions-description: Maintenance actions are {destructive_in_bold} and should be used with caution. Performing any of these actions is {irreversible_in_bold}.

admin.ingredients-natural-language-processor-e: Mealie uses Conditional Random Fields (CRFs) for parsing and processing ingredients. The model used for ingredients is based off a data set of over 100,000 ingredients from a dataset compiled by the New York Times. Note that as the model is trained in English only, you may have varied results when using the model in other languages. This page is a playground for testing the model.

It's not perfect, but it yields great results in general and is a good starting point for manually parsing ingredients into individual fields. Alternatively, you can also use the "Brute" processor that uses a pattern matching technique to identify ingredients.
admin.background-tasks-description: Here you can view all the running background tasks and their status

setup.welcome-to-mealie-get-started: Welcome to Mealie! Let's get started
setup.already-set-up-bring-to-homepage: I'm already set up, just bring me to the homepage
setup.common-settings-for-new-sites: Here are some common settings for new sites
setup.here-are-a-few-things-to-help-you-get-st: Here are a few things to help you get started with Mealie
setup.restore-from-v1-backup: Have a backup from a previous instance of Mealie v1? You can restore it here.
setup.manage-profile-or-get-invite-link: Manage your own profile, or grab an invite link to share with others.

profile.description: Manage your profile, recipes, and group settings.
profile.account-summary-description: Here's a summary of your group's information
profile.group-statistics-description: Your Group Statistics provide some insight how you're using Mealie.
profile.storage-capacity-description: Your storage capacity is a calculation of the images and assets you have uploaded.
profile.personal-description: These are settings that are personal to you. Changes here won't affect other users
profile.user-settings-description: Manage your preferences, change your password, and update your email
profile.api-tokens-description: Manage your API Tokens for access from external applications
profile.group-description: These items are shared within your group. Editing one of them will change it for the whole group!
profile.group-settings-description: Urejaj tvoje skupne nastavitve skupin, kot npr. nastavitve jedilnika in zasebnosti.
profile.cookbooks-description: Manage a collection of recipe categories and generate pages for them.
profile.members-description: See who's in your group and manage their permissions.
profile.webhooks-description: Nastavi webhooke, ki se sprožijo na dneve, ko imaš planiran jedilnik.
profile.notifiers-description: Setup email and push notifications that trigger on specific events.
profile.manage-data-description: Manage your Food and Units (more options coming soon)
profile.data-migrations-description: Migrate your existing data from other applications like Nextcloud Recipes and Chowdown
profile.show-advanced-description: Show advanced features (API Keys, Webhooks, and Data Management)

cookbook.description: Cookbooks are another way to organize recipes by creating cross sections of recipes and tags. Creating a cookbook will add an entry to the side-bar and all the recipes with the tags and categories chosen will be displayed in the cookbook.
cookbook.public-cookbook-description: Public Cookbooks can be shared with non-mealie users and will be displayed on your groups page.
cookbook.filter-options-description: When require all is selected the cookbook will only include recipes that have all of the items selected. This applies to each subset of selectors and not a cross section of the selected items.
